snippet: Dallas agreed to terms with the former Panthers defensive end Greg Hardy, the Cowboys said Wednesday, the same day the N.F.L. filed a lawsuit seeking the release of records from the bench trial that led to Hardy’s conviction last summer on...
abstract: Dallas Cowboys reach deal with former Carolina Panthers defensive end Greg Hardy; other NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: Dallas agreed to terms with the former Panthers defensive end Greg Hardy, the Cowboys said Wednesday, the same day the N.F.L. filed a lawsuit seeking the release of records from the bench trial that led to Hardy’s conviction last summer on domestic-violence charges.

headline.main: Cowboys and Greg Hardy Reach Agreement
